text: Edinson Roberto Cavani Gómez (born 14 February 1987) is a Uruguayan footballer. He plays as a striker for Argentine Primera División team Boca Juniors and the Uruguay national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Danubio 2005–06 Uruguayan Primera División 10 4 5 3 — — — 15 7 2006–07 Uruguayan Primera División 15 5 — — — — 15 5 Total 25 9 5 3 — — — 30 12 Palermo 2006–07 Serie A 7 2 — — — — 7 2 2007–08 Serie A 33 5 2 0 — 2 0 — 37 5 2008–09 Serie A 35 14 1 1 — — — 36 15 2009–10 Serie A 34 13 3 2 — — — 37 15 Total 109 34 6 3 — 2 0 — 117 37 Napoli 2010–11 Serie A 35 26 2 0 — 10 7 — 47 33 2011–12 Serie A 35 23 5 5 — 8 5 — 48 33 2012–13 Serie A 34 29 1 1 — 7 7 1Appearance in Supercoppa Italiana 1 43 38 Total 104 78 8 6 — 25 19 1 1 138 104 Paris Saint-Germain 2013–14 Ligue 1 30 16 2 1 3 4 8 4 0 0 43 25 2014–15 Ligue 1 35 18 4 4 3 3 10 6 1Appearance in Trophée des Champions 0 53 31 2015–16 Ligue 1 32 19 5 2 4 1 10 2 1 1 52 25 2016–17 Ligue 1 36 35 3 2 3 4 8 8 0 0 50 49 2017–18 Ligue 1 32 28 5 3 2 2 8 7 1 0 48 40 2018–19 Ligue 1 21 18 3 2 2 1 7 2 0 0 33 23 2019–20 Ligue 1 14 4 2 2 2 0 3 1 1 0 22 7 Total 200 138 24 16 19 15 54 30 4 1 301 200 Manchester United 2020–21 Premier League 26 10 3 0 1 1 9 6 — 39 17 2021–22 Premier League 15 2 1 0 0 0 4 0 — 20 2 Total 41 12 4 0 1 1 13 6 — 59 19 Valencia 2022–23 La Liga 25 5 2 2 — — 1Appearance in Supercopa de España 0 28 7 Boca Juniors 2023 Argentine Primera División 5 1 2 1 0 0 5 1 0 0 12 2 Career total 509 277 51 31 20 16 99 56 6 2 685 381 Notes ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Uruguay 2008 4 1 2009 8 0 2010 12 7 2011 12 2 2012 9 3 2013 15 7 2014 10 4 2015 8 4 2016 11 9 2017 9 3 2018 11 6 2019 7 4 2020 2 1 2021 8 2 2022 10 5 Total 136 58 :Scores and results list Uruguay's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Cavani goal.
